text:
Hi all, does anyone know a way to create a redirect so that a visitor can see the thank you page with pdf only if he submits the form. The idea is to prevent for example sharing the direct link to the thank you page on a facebook group.

<http://www.example.com/landing-page|www.example.com/landing-page>
<http://www.example.com/thank-you-page|www.example.com/thank-you-page>

If the visitor goes to the thank you page via direct traffic, he will be redirected to the landing page.
